comments.content: I could be wrong, but it looks like a carefully modified Times New Roman

Fivos might be right about Times. Main work for customization would be on /a counter.  
Same ballpark for these letters only: [Caslon Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701125810/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/caslon+black), [Romana](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701125810/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/romana) Ultra Bold, [Grouch ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701125810/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/grouch), [Caslon Graphique](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701125810/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/caslon-graphique), [Emfatick](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701125810/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/emfatick-nf), [Horsham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701125810/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/horsham), [Starling](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701125810/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/starling), [Cabernet](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701125810/http:/marketplace.veer.com/font/Cabernet-Complete-JBT0001003)
